name: A night to remember (Anydel)
description:
An interactive story made for the "Vampire - The Masquerade Jam" based on VTM v5. It's my second game every, made in Twine. Small in scope, as I didn't have as much time as I hoped. I hope you still enjoy it.

Play a night in the life of an ordinary Toreador who visits an ordinary art exhibition of their clan.

Try to create the best art you could possibly imagine by any means necessary. 

Try to best your rival! The most important thing is that everyone sees your artistic genius. 

It will be certainly a fun and engaging night, fit for all proud Kindred!
